subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon lost his car chief when Jeff Meendering joined Petty Enterprises as crew chief for Bobby Labonte. Meendering began his career at Hendrick Motorsports 13 years ago sweeping floors. He was the interim crew chief during a six-race stretch this season when Steve Letarte was suspended. His new job with Petty will start immediately.
